Field Label: Record ID

This survey is conducted by Uganda Virus Research Institute (UVRI) in collaboration with WHO-AFRO and other researchers from Africa, and aims to understand how healthcare professionals feel regarding their preparedness to deliver infection prevention and control (IPC) procedures in healthcare settings during the COVID-19 pandemic. This survey will take you (2-5mins) to complete.

 

The information we collect will help improve preparedness to prevent healthcare workers becoming ill and to effectively prevent spread of COVID-19. In this survey, we refer to infection prevention and control procedures that should be adopted when managing patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19. 

 

All data will be stored and processed in accordance with national regulations. Approvals for this study have been obtained from Uganda National Council for Science and Technology.

This study has been reviewed and approved by the UVRI Research Ethics Committee and the Uganda National Council for Science and Technology.
